content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Could you please provide me with your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to negotiate the rental price. I would like to know if the apartment is available for the next year.

My offer is 1200 Euros per month.

What is your offer?

If you are willing to accept my offer, please let me know.

If not, I am open to hear your counter offer.

Thank you for your time.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. I am willing to accept your offer of 1200 Euros per month for the next year. However, I would like to clarify that this offer is subject to certain conditions, such as a security deposit and a lease agreement. Could you please provide me with more details on these conditions?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I understand. I am willing to pay a security deposit of 3 months rent, and I am willing to sign a lease agreement for the next year.

I also want to know if the apartment is available for the next year.

Thank you for your time.

If you are satisfied with my offer, please let me know.

If not, I am open to hearing your counter offer.

Thank you for your time.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your willingness to pay a security deposit and sign a lease agreement, Maria. I am happy to inform you that the apartment is available for the next year. Based on our discussion, I am willing to accept your offer of 1200 Euros per month for the next year. I appreciate your interest in my apartment and I look forward to welcoming you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
